channel.title: Culture on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: The Manifesto
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Aim for Quality Quality exists in every piece of work. We thrive to deliver the best because we can.

item.title: Ogif
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I would like to introduce to you our new initiative called OGIF — Oh God It’s Friday. Moving forward, our Friday Showcase will have a broader range of topics to discuss and share.

item.title: The Inner Circle
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The concept of an “inner circle” within a company is not a new one, and at Dwarves, a software company founded by a group of engineers, this idea holds a significant value.

item.title: The Dwarves Culture Handbook
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: For the past 5 years, we didn’t have something called ‘Culture Book’. Whenever a newbie steps in, it’s natural to pick up the job and go with the flow.
